author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MARIO IS NO LONGER A TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE FINAL NHC ADVISORY...
summary: ...MARIO IS NO LONGER A TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE FINAL NHC ADVISORY... As of 12:00 AM CST Sat Sep 13 the center of Mario was located near 18.3, -105.3 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MARIO IS NO LONGER A TROPICAL CYCLONE... ...THIS IS THE FINAL NHC ADVISORY... As of 12:00 AM CST Sat Sep 13 the center of Mario was located near 18.3, -105.3 with movement WNW at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary - Remnants of Mario (EP3/EP132025)
